XDptx_MainStreamAttributes Struct Reference

#include <xdptx.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This typedef contains the main stream attributes which determine how the video will be displayed.


Public Attributes

u32 HClkTotal
u32 VClkTotal

Member Data Documentation

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::AvgBytesPerTU

Average number of bytes per transfer unit, scaled up by a factor of 1000.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::BitsPerColor

Number of bits per color component.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::DataPerLane

Used to translate the number of pixels per line to the native internal 16-bit datapath.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::HBackPorch

Horizontal back porch (in pixels).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::HClkTotal

Horizontal total time (in pixels).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::HFrontPorch

Horizontal front porch (in pixels).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::HResolution

Horizontal resolution (in pixels).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::HStart

Horizontal blank start (in pixels).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::HSyncPolarity

Horizontal synchronization polarity (0=positive/1=negative).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::HSyncPulseWidth

Horizontal synchronization time (in pixels).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::InitWait

Number of initial wait cycles at the start of a new line by the framing logic.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::Interlaced

Input stream is interlaced.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::Misc0

Miscellaneous stream attributes 0 as specified by the DisplayPort 1.2 specification.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::Misc1

Miscellaneous stream attributes 1 as specified by the DisplayPort 1.2 specification.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::MVid

M value for the video stream. This value is equal to the pixel clock in KHz.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::NVid

N value for the video stream.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::TransferUnitSize

Size of the transfer unit in the framing logic.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::UserPixelWidth

The width of the user data input port.

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::VBackPorch

Vertical back porch (in lines).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::VClkTotal

Vertical total time (in pixels).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::VFrontPorch

Vertical front porch (in lines).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::VResolution

Vertical resolution (in lines).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::VStart

Vertical blank start (in lines).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::VSyncPolarity

Vertical synchronization polarity (0=positive/1=negative).

u32 XDptx_MainStreamAttributes::VSyncPulseWidth

Vertical synchronization time (in lines
